compatibility.notes: MTLL is designed to be permissive and compatible with other permissive licenses. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text and copyright notice in all redistributions.
Provide acknowledgment of the original authors and institutions involved.
Ensure that the software is provided 'as is' without warranties.
license.name: MTLL
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of authors in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and conditions in binary redistributions.
Include specific acknowledgment in documentation or software.
Obtain written permission to use the name 'MTL' for endorsement or promotion.
Obtain written permission to use 'MTL' in the name of derived products.
